title: Megan McKenna showcases her bouncy blonde tresses during a shoot for her hair extensions range
text:
She is the face of the Megan Mckenna Easilocks range.

And the former TOWIE star, 27, was her own best advertisement as she sported a glamorous head of bouncy curls for a shoot in Kings Cross, London, on Friday.

Megan looked typically glamorous as she showcased her voluminous head of curls, which were enhanced thanks to her clip in layers of hair extensions.

Increidble: Megan McKenna, 27, was her own best advertisement as she sported a glamorous head of bouncy curls for a shoot in Kings Cross, London, on Friday

Megan's glossy mane was given some assistance from a member of the crew, who was at hand with a hair brush to ensure that their tresses were styled to perfection.

For the shoot Megan donned a black leather shirt, which was cinched around her svelte midriff with a silver-buckled belt so show off her enviable frame.

She teamed the garment with a pair of chic white trousers and a pair of burgundy slip on heels, which boosted her already statuesque frame.

Picture perfect: Megan's glossy mane was given some assistance from a member of the crew, who was at hand with a hair brush to ensure that their tresses were styled to perfection

Glam: Megan looked typically glamorous as she showcased her voluminous head of curls, which were enhanced thanks to her clip in layers of hair extensions

Keeping the attention on her hair, Megan opted for no accessories but sported a full face of glamorous make-up including a bronze smokey-eye and nude lip.

Following the shoot, Megan wore a far more casual ensemble as she was seen leaving the Kings Cross hotel wearing burnt orange co-ords and trainers.

Elsewhere, Megan is appearing on the Celebrity version of X Factor, in a further bid to kick start her music career following her exit from TOWIE.

The celebrity line up is Megan, The Islanders - made up of Love Island 2018 contestants Wes Nelson, 21, Zara McDermott, 22, Samira Mighty and Eyal Booker, 24.

Ricki Lake, 51, Try Star - made up of rugby players Thom Evans, 34, Levi Davis, 21, Ben Foden, 34, The Chase star Jenny Ryan, 37.

Cole & Edwards - made up of Strictly star - Brendan Cole, 43 and actor Jeremy Edwards, 48, Glee star Kevin McHale, 31.

Only recently, in an interview ahead of the launch, Simon revealed the reason why he decided to revamp the normal show into a celebrity version.

'It just felt so obvious to do a celebrity version', he explained. 'The only condition was I couldn’t know who was going to be on it. I said to the team, "You’ve got to find some acts who you believe can sell records off the back of this, because if you don’t do that it won’t work."

'So that was the deal and we stuck to it. I swear to God I didn’t have a clue who any of the acts were. I did walk away thinking, “If we’re smart, we have artists here who could actually sell records off the back of this”. So I thought that was fun and very exciting for the show.'
